title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
No water damage. Just stopped working. visual inspection with no result, board seems ok. 


Power rails:

PPBUS - 0V ( not shorted)
PPDCIN_G3H - 5.2V
PP5V_S5  - 0V  (not shorted)
PP3V3_G3H  - 0V (not shorted)
BUF_SMC_RESET_L - 0V
SMC_RESET_L - 0V


CD3215 no LDO have voltage.

title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
So you don't get voltage on any CD3215 LDO?
Compare diode mode readings on all LDO with another board.
Any voltage at R7020?

title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
i dont have another working board like this here. 


On R7020 i get 5.2 V both sides.

title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
Any board with CD3215 should have similar readings!

Post few basic voltages on U7100; TBA_AUX_DET. TBA_VDDA/P, PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H, PM_EN_P3V3_G3H.

title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
got same board today (working)

U3100
PP3V3_UPC_XA_LDO  0.505 (0.505--> will put here working board)
PP1V8_UPC_XA_LDOA  0.525 (0.521)
PP1V8_UPC_XA_LDOD  0.486 (0.482)


U3200 are same almost may be with 0.001-0.003 difference that i think doesnt matter.



TBA_AUX_DET - 1.2V

TBA_VDDA/P  5V (both)

PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H  1.2V 

PM_EN_P3V3_G3H  2.2V

title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
"PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H  1.2V"
Post diode mode to ground.
Check R6906 and D6905.

title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H   - 0.150

R6906/05 are ok. About D6905 is very strange because replaced it from donor board and not usb pulsing ( i have usb-c adapter that show V and Amps and it is blinking every 4-5 seconds ) and not recieving voltage, put back original and get 5V again. D6905 ?

title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
"PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H   - 0.150"
That's no good.
Suspetcs are C6990/91, U6990, C7078, U7000; remove them (one by one), in this order.

Why don't you check diode integrity, instead of changing???

title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
I would like to use it but I dont know very well how diode integrity is working. 


What make you think that 0.150 is failing C6990/91, etc?

title: 820-00840 no power. Stuck at 5V
message:
Should be much higher; similar issue 2-3 weeks ago in other thread.
You should read all, nor only personal threads...
